column2: Hey, what’s the biggest news story or issue you’ve heard about lately?
column3: Can you tell me more about that news story? What have you heard about it, where did you hear it, and how do you feel about it?
column4: So, why does that event or issue feel like the most important one to you right now?
column5: You mentioned you feel like you can help make things better for kids in the U.S.—what kind of changes do you think you could make, and how would you go about it?
column6: What are you thinking of dressing up as for Halloween this year?
column7: When you’re out trick-or-treating, what’s the absolute best thing you could get in your bag?
column8: On the flip side, what’s the worst thing someone could give you while trick-or-treating?
column9: You said you’re planning to watch something Halloween-themed—what’s your all-time favorite show or movie to watch around Halloween?
column10: Tell me everything about how you feel about Halloween! What are you most excited for this year?

column3: it’s a woman Kamala against Donald Trump; heard from parents, school, and TV; makes me feel nervous but also excited.
column5: if grownups and kids listened and tried to be nicer, things wouldn’t be so hard or scary.
column7: Hershey bars, like the full-size ones.
column10: Excited to wear my costume, go trick or treating, and hang out with friends—plus the candy!
